Bash(PYTHONPATH=. python3 -c "
import sys
sys.path.append(''6_synthesis_engine'')
from pathlib import Path

# Get all papers
all_papers = list(Path(''3_synthesis_ready'').glob(''*.json''))
print(f''Total papers: {len(all_papers)}'')

# Get processed papers
processed = set()
fresh_dir = Path(''8_stage_outputs/stage_1a/fresh_july10'')
if fresh_dir.exists():
    for f in fresh_dir.glob(''*.json''):
        processed.add(f.stem.split(''_1a_'')[0])

print(f''Processed papers: {len(processed)}'')
print(''Processed:'', list(processed))

# Get remaining 
remaining = [p.stem for p in all_papers if p.stem not in processed]
print(f''Remaining papers: {len(remaining)}'')
print(''First 5 remaining:'', remaining[:5])
")
Bash(for stage in stage_1a stage_1b stage_2b stage_3a stage_3b stage_4a stage_4b stage_5a stage_5b)
